  _comscore.push({ c1: "2", c2: "6036484" });

    s.src = (document.location.protocol == "https:" ? "https://sb" : "http://b") + ".scorecardresearch.com/beacon.js";

  function trackAjaxSRPresult(url, type) {
		var title = document.getElementsByTagName("title")[0].innerHTML;
		title = title.replace("TimesJobs.com", type + " Jobs");
		title = title.concat(" | TimesJobs.com");

		c.src = "https://sb.scorecardresearch.com/p?c1=" + t + "&c2=" + n +"&c3=" + r + "&c4=" + i + "&c5=" + s + "&c6=" + o + "&c8=" + u + "&c15=" + a + "&cv=" + f + "&cj=" + l + "&ns__t=" + (new Date).getTime();
		document.body.appendChild(c);
	}
  
	
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
/*!
* jQuery Cookie Plugin v1.3.1
* https://github.com/carhartl/jquery-cookie
*
* Copyright 2013 Klaus Hartl
* Released under the MIT license
*/
(function (factory) {
if (typeof define === 'function' && define.amd && define.amd.jQuery) {
// AMD. Register as anonymous module.
define(['jquery'], factory);
} else {
// Browser globals.
factory(jQuery);
}
}(function ($) {

var pluses = /\+/g;

function raw(s) {
return s;
}

function decoded(s) {
return decodeURIComponent(s.replace(pluses, ' '));
}

function converted(s) {
if (s.indexOf('"') === 0) {
// This is a quoted cookie as according to RFC2068, unescape
s = s.slice(1, -1).replace(/\\"/g, '"').replace(/\\\\/g, '\\');
}
try {
return config.json ? JSON.parse(s) : s;
} catch(er) {}
}

var config = $.cookie = function (key, value, options) {

// write
if (value !== undefined) {
options = $.extend({}, config.defaults, options);

if (typeof options.expires === 'number') {
var days = options.expires, t = options.expires = new Date();
t.setDate(t.getDate() + days);
}

value = config.json ? JSON.stringify(value) : String(value);

return (document.cookie = [
encodeURIComponent(key), '=', config.raw ? value : encodeURIComponent(value),
options.expires ? '; expires=' + options.expires.toUTCString() : '', // use expires attribute, max-age is not supported by IE
options.path ? '; path=' + options.path : '',
options.domain ? '; domain=' + options.domain : '',
options.secure ? '; secure' : ''
].join(''));
}

// read
var decode = config.raw ? raw : decoded;
var cookies = document.cookie.split('; ');
var result = key ? undefined : {};
for (var i = 0, l = cookies.length; i < l; i++) {
var parts = cookies[i].split('=');
var name = decode(parts.shift());
var cookie = decode(parts.join('='));

if (key && key === name) {
result = converted(cookie);
break;
}

if (!key) {
result[name] = converted(cookie);
}
}

return result;
};

config.defaults = {};

$.removeCookie = function (key, options) {
if ($.cookie(key) !== undefined) {
$.cookie(key, '', $.extend(options, { expires: -1 }));
return true;
}
return false;
};

}));
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
	jQuery.cookie('previous_browser_url', $.cookie('current_browser_url'));
	jQuery.cookie('current_browser_url', window.location.href);
	//setCookie('previous_browser_url',getCookie('current_browser_url'));
	//setCookie('current_browser_url', window.location.href);
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
	function getPredefinedActionName(url){
		var returnActionName = "";
		var from = url.lastIndexOf("/");
		var to = url.indexOf("?",from);
		if(-1!=to){
			returnActionName = url.substring(from,to);
		}else{
			returnActionName = url.substring(from);
		}
		return returnActionName;
	}
	</script>

margin-left:300px;

}
</style>
<script type="text/javascript">

var notification_timeout = 10000;
var notification_cache = true;
function ping(url){
 var ImageObject = new Image();
 ImageObject.src = url; //e.g. logo
}
var cand_context="";
	if(-1 == window.location.href.indexOf("/candidate/")) {
		  cand_context="/candidate/";
		  //alert("bingo");
	}

		function getMailInBoxUnreadCount(){
			var rurl=cand_context+"inbox-message-get-unread-count.html";
			jQuery.ajax({
				cache:notification_cache,
				url:rurl,
				success:function(data){
					console.log("success... inbox-message-get-unread-count.html"+'');
				},
				error: function(x, textStatus, m) {
					console.log("Failed"+m);
					if(textStatus == 'timeout')
			        {     
			             console.log("Failed from timeout");
			            //do something. Try again perhaps?
			            var randomnumber=Math.floor(Math.random()*100000001);
						var nlpurl='https://alerts.timesjobs.com/naf/nlpTracking.html?captchaType='+rurl+'&op=respTracking#'+randomnumber;
						ping(nlpurl);
			        }
		    	}
			});
		}
		
		function getDistinctEmployerCounts(){
		 var rurl=cand_context+"inbox-getDistinctEmployerForLoginIdAndFolder.html?mode=inbox_RE";
		 jQuery.ajax({
			cache:notification_cache,
			timeout:notification_timeout,
			url:rurl,
			success:function(data){
				//alert("RE-success");
				//alert(selectedTab+",data"+data+" for"+jQuery("#inbox_header").hasClass("inbox-header"));
				jQuery("#mytj_inbox_re").html(data);
				jQuery("#mytj_header_re").html(data);
				jQuery("#homeindex_inbox_re").html(data);
				jQuery("#headerhome_inbox_re").html(data);
			},
			error: function(x, textStatus, m) {
					if(textStatus == 'timeout')
			        {     
			            console.log("Failed from timeout");
			            var randomnumber=Math.floor(Math.random()*100000001);
						var nlpurl='https://alerts.timesjobs.com/naf/nlpTracking.html?captchaType='+rurl+'&op=respTracking#'+randomnumber;
						ping(nlpurl);
			            //do something. Try again perhaps?
			        }
		    }
			
		});
	//alert("call in progress...");	
		 jQuery.ajax({
			cache:notification_cache,
			timeout:notification_timeout,
			url:cand_context+"inbox-getDistinctEmployerForLoginIdAndFolder.html?mode=inbox_PV",
			success:function(data){
				//alert("PV-success");	
				//alert(selectedTab+",data"+data+" for"+jQuery("#inbox_header").hasClass("inbox-header"));
				jQuery("#mytj_inbox_pv").html(data);
				jQuery("#mytj_header_pv").html(data);
				jQuery("#homeindex_inbox_pv").html(data);
				jQuery("#headerhome_inbox_pv").html(data);
			},
			error: function(x, textStatus, m) {
					if(textStatus == 'timeout')
			        {     
			             console.log("Failed from timeout");
			            var randomnumber=Math.floor(Math.random()*100000001);
						var nlpurl='https://alerts.timesjobs.com/naf/nlpTracking.html?captchaType='+cand_context+"inbox-getDistinctEmployerForLoginIdAndFolder.html?mode=inbox_PV"+'&op=respTracking#'+randomnumber;
						ping(nlpurl);
			        }
		    }
		});
	 }
	function displayLoading(div){
	if(1 == tab || 2 == tab || 4 == tab || 5 == tab  ){
			jQuery(div).append("<div class='loading'>&nbsp;</div>");
	}
}
</script>

function trimData(field,length){
	if(field.length>length){
       field=field.substring(0,length); 
    }
    return field;
}


var dataLoader="<img src='https://static.timesjobs.com/images_cand/tj_images/personlisation/loader.gif' alt='Loading' class='data-loading'>";
var widget_timeout = 5000;
var widgets_fcl ='null';

var widgets_context_url = '/candidate';

</script>
<script>
var isRememberMe=false;
function callURL(feature){
	if(isRememberMe){
		if(feature == 'mytj')
				  window.location = '/candidate/myhome.html';
		else if (feature == 'mycareer')
				 window.location = '/candidate/mycareer.html';
		return;
	}else{
	ajaxController.isUserAuthenticated(function(response){
			if (response != null) {
				if (response == true) {
			  		if(feature == 'mytj')
			  			window.location = '/candidate/myhome.html';
			  		else if (feature == 'mycareer')
			  			window.location = '/candidate/mycareer.html';
				}else{
							var url="/candidate/ajaxLoginJobApply.html?fromPg="+feature;
							GB_showCenter('You Are Not Logged In', url, 350, 600);
					}
				}
			});
  	}
		
}
	
</script>

<script <script type="text/javascript">
				jQuery(document).ready(function() {
					jQuery("#career-affection").show();
					jQuery("#career-affection-rhs").show();

<ul class="main-tj-nav clearfix">
<script type="text/javascript">
var notification_timeout = 10000;
var notification_cache = true;
if (!window.console) console = {log: function() {}};

if(typeof String.prototype.trim !== 'function') {
  String.prototype.trim = function() {
    return this.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g, ''); 
  }
}


/* This function is used to set cookies */
function setCookie(name,value,expires,path,domain,secure) {
  document.cookie = name + "=" + escape (value) +
    ((expires) ? "; expires=" + expires.toGMTString() : "") +
    ((path) ? "; path=" + path : "") +
    ((domain) ? "; domain=" + domain : "") + ((secure) ? "; secure" : "");
}

/* This function is used to get cookies */
function getCookie(name) {
	var prefix = name + "=" ;
	var start = document.cookie.indexOf(prefix); 

	if (start==-1) {
		return null;
	}
	
	var end = document.cookie.indexOf(";", start+prefix.length);
	if (end==-1) {
		end=document.cookie.length;
	}

	var value=document.cookie.substring(start+prefix.length, end) ;
	return unescape(value);
}


function deleteCookie(name,path,domain) {
  if (getCookie(name)) {
    document.cookie = name + "=" +
      ((path) ? "; path=" + path : "") +
      ((domain) ? "; domain=" + domain : "") +
      "; expires=Thu, 01-Jan-70 00:00:01 GMT";
  }
}

var authenticated = 'false';

jQuery(document).ready(function(){
var alreadyCalled = false;

//alert("logged-in:"+authenticated);
//alert("comparison to true, for"+authenticated +", "+ ('true' == authenticated));

if('true' == authenticated){
	//jQuery(".viewnoteTab").mouseout(function(){
//	  jQuery(".showdiv").hide();
//	});
//	jQuery(".viewnoteTab").mouseenter(function(){
//	  jQuery(".showdiv").show();
//	});
	//alert("logged in ");
}else{
	//alert("not logged in ");
	jQuery(".notif-cls").on("click",function(){
		//alert('hi');
	  jQuery("#inline_login").hide();
	  //jQuery(".notification .nav-drop").hide();
	  jQuery(".notification").removeClass("notifi");
	});
	updateNonLoggedInUsersTime();
}
function updateNonLoggedInUsersTime(){
	//alert("non_loggedin_time:"+getCookie('non_loggedin_time'));
	var setCookieForTime = getCookie('non_loggedin_time');
	if(null!=setCookieForTime){
		//alert("cookie found to be set to : "+setCookieForTime+" where time since is:"+timeSince(setCookieForTime));
		jQuery("#non_loggedin_time").html(timeSince(setCookieForTime));
	}else{
		var currentTime = new Date().getTime();
		setCookie('non_loggedin_time',currentTime);
	}
}

jQuery(".viewnote").on("click",function(){
	var loggedInClicked = getCookie('loggedin_click');
	if(null!=loggedInClicked){
		jQuery("#notification_count").css("background-color","#075DC1");
	}else{
		if('true' == authenticated){
			setCookie('loggedin_click',1);
			//alert("setting loggedInClicked");
		}
	}
});	

});

</script>
<!--- view notification section begin --->
<li class="notification viewnote">
<a class="dropdown-button" data-activates="notifyDropdown" href="#">
<i class="material-icons left">notifications_none</i>
<span class="notif-count-new" id="notification_count">1</span>
	</a>
<div class="nav-drop viewnoteTab dropdown-content" id="notifyDropdown">
<div class="showdiv">
<div class="notif-not-logedin" id="non_loggedin" style="display:none;">
<div class="notif-welcm-msg clearfix">To see all recommended jobs, profile views, recruiter's contacted information, updates and more...</div>
<div class="notif-act clearfix">
<button class="waves-effect waves-light btn red-bdr-btn" onclick="GB_showCenter('Login Details','/candidate/ajaxLoginJobApply.html?fromPg=header',350,600);" type="button">Login</button>
<strong class="or">or</strong>
<a class="waves-effect waves-light btn red-bdr-btn" href="/candidate/register.html">Register</a>
</div>
</div>
<!-- INLINE LOGIN PAGE -->
<div class="notif-login-frm" id="inline_login" style="display:none;">
<span class="notif-cls" title="Click to Hide"></span>
<strong>Login to View Notifications!</strong>
<form action="/candidate/times_login?BeforeLoginUrl=notification&amp;tab=1" method="post" name="loginFormNotification">
<input class="txt2 defaultValue inpt-typ" id="txtUseNameNotification" name="j_username" onblur="javascript:settextNotification('txtUseNameNotification');" onclick="filltxtNotification(txtUseNameNotification)" size="42" type="text" value="Enter Email id / Login id"/>
<input class="password_input_notification" name="j_password" size="42" style="display:none" type="password" value=""/>
<input class="clearNotification" size="42" type="text" value="Enter Password"/>

<input class="" onclick="javascript:return validateLoginFormNotification();" type="submit" value="Login"/>
<div class="error-msg dflt-msg" id="loginErrNotification" style="display:none;">

<div class="notif-main" id="base" style="display: none;">

<script type="text/javascript">

function forgotPasswordNotification(){
		GB_showCenter('Forgot Password','/candidate/ForgetPassword.html',180,420);
	}
var race = 0;
function showNotificationLoginThickBox(){

race = 1;

			//jQuery("#inline_login").addClass('notifyshow');
			//jQuery('.viewnoteTab').addClass('notifyshow');
			//jQuery('.showdiv').addClass('notifyshow');
			//jQuery(".notif-not-logedin").hide();
			//jQuery(".notification .nav-drop").css('display','block');
			//jQuery(".notification").addClass("notifi");
			jQuery('.clearNotification').css({color:"#b3b3b3"});
					jQuery('.clearNotification').focus(function(){
						//alert('check');
						jQuery(this).hide();
						jQuery(' .password_input_notification').show();
						jQuery('.password_input_notification').focus();
					});
					jQuery('.password_input_notification').blur(function(){
						if(this.value==''){
						jQuery(this).hide();
							jQuery('.clearNotification').show();
						}
					});
		


}
jQuery(".notif-cls").on("click",function(){
	  //jQuery("#inline_login").removeClass('notifyshow');
	  //jQuery("#inline_login").parents('.viewnoteTab').removeClass('notifyshow');
	  //jQuery("#inline_login").parents('.showdiv').removeClass('notifyshow');

	 // jQuery(".notif-not-logedin").show();
	 jQuery(".notif-not-logedin").css('display','');
	  //jQuery(".notification .nav-drop").css('display','none');
	  jQuery(".notification").removeClass("notifi");
	});
jQuery(".viewnote").mouseenter(function(){
//alert("mouseenter called..");
  //jQuery(".showdiv").show();
  //jQuery(".notification .nav-drop").show();
  
  if('false' == authenticated){
    var hideCountCookie = getCookie('hide_nologgedin_count');
    if(null == hideCountCookie){
  		setCookie('hide_nologgedin_count',1);
  		//alert("setting hide_nologgedin_count");
  	}else{
  		jQuery("#notification_count").hide();
  	}
  }else{
   jQuery("#inline_login").hide();
   jQuery("#non_loggedin").hide();
   	
   	updateNotificationComponentWithIECheck();
  }
  
});
jQuery(".viewnote").mouseleave(function(){
//alert("mouseenter called..");
  //jQuery(".showdiv").hide();
  //jQuery(".notification .nav-drop").hide();
});
jQuery(".notif-login-frm").mouseleave(function(){
//alert("mouseenter called..");
  event.stopPropagation()
});
function settextNotification(id){
		if(document.getElementById('txtUseNameNotification').value !=''){
			document.getElementById(id).checked=true;
		}else{
			document.getElementById(id).checked=false;
			document.getElementById('txtUseNameNotification').value='Enter Email id / Login id';
			document.getElementById('txtUseNameNotification').style.color='#999'
		}
	}
function filltxtNotification(id){
		if(document.getElementById('txtUseNameNotification').value=='Enter Email id / Login id')
			document.getElementById('txtUseNameNotification').value=''
		document.getElementById('txtUseNameNotification').style.color='#333'
	}
function validateLoginFormNotification(){
var status = true;
		if(document.getElementById('txtUseNameNotification').value=='Enter Email id / Login id'){
			document.getElementById('txtUseNameNotification').value='';
			status =  false;
		}
		
		if(checkBlankNotification(document.loginFormNotification.j_username,"Login ID")){
			status =  false;
		}
		if(checkBlankNotification(document.loginFormNotification.j_password,"Password")){
			status =  false;
		}
		//update_notification_cookie
		if(status){
			deleteCookie('update_notification_cookie');
		}
		return status;
	}
function checkBlankNotification(field,name){
		if(field.value.trim() == ""){	
			field.value = "";
			field.focus();
			document.getElementById("loginErrNotification").style.display="";
			return true;
		}
		return false;
	}
	
var diff = 1674928189-((new Date().getTime())/1000);


function ellipsize(str, len) {
	if(str.length > len) {
 		return str.substr(0,len) + "...";
	} else {
		return str;
	}
}

function timeSince(previous){

	current =  new Date().getTime()+diff;
	var milleSecondsPerMinute = 60 * 1000;
    var milleSecondsPerHour = milleSecondsPerMinute * 60;
    var milleSecondsPerDay = milleSecondsPerHour * 24;
    var milleSecondsPerMonth = milleSecondsPerDay * 30;
    var milleSecondsPerYear = milleSecondsPerDay * 365;
	
    var elapsed = current - previous;

    if (elapsed < milleSecondsPerMinute) {
         value = Math.round(elapsed/1000) + ' seconds ago';   
    }

    else if (elapsed < milleSecondsPerHour) {
    	value = Math.round(elapsed/milleSecondsPerMinute) + ' minutes ago';   
    }

    else if (elapsed < milleSecondsPerDay ) {
    	value = Math.round(elapsed/milleSecondsPerHour ) + ' hours ago';   
    }

    else if (elapsed < milleSecondsPerMonth) {
    	value =  Math.round(elapsed/milleSecondsPerDay) + ' days ago';   
    }

    else if (elapsed < milleSecondsPerYear) {
    	value = Math.round(elapsed/milleSecondsPerMonth) + ' months ago';   
    }

    else {
    	value = Math.round(elapsed/milleSecondsPerYear ) + ' years ago';   
    }
    //return (value);
    return (value);
}


function updateNotificationComponent(){
 alreadyCalled  =true;	
	var context="";
	if(-1 == window.location.href.indexOf("/candidate/")) {
		  context="/candidate/";
		  //alert("bingo");
	}
	
	
	ajaxController.getLoginId(function(response){
	//alert("updateNotificationComponent,response:"+response)
		if (response != null && response.trim().length > 0) {
			jQuery.ajax({
							cache:notification_cache,
							timeout:notification_timeout,
							url:context+"inbox-notifications.html?from=",
							success:function(data){
							var trimLength = 30;
									jQuery("#base_ja").remove();
									jQuery("#base_j").remove();
									jQuery("#base_rv").remove();
									//alert(data);
									var parsedData = JSON.parse(data);
									var theCount = parsedData["count"];
									
									var jaCount = parsedData["jaCount"];
									var jCount = parsedData["jCount"];
									var rvCount = parsedData["rvCount"];
									
									/**
									*UNTILL Resume Contacted is pulled down do the following:
									*/
									//theCount = theCount - jCount;
									/**
									*UNTILL Resume Contacted is pulled down do the following:
									*/
									
									if(theCount >= 0){
										if(theCount >= 0){
											if(theCount <99){
												jQuery("#notification_count").html(theCount);
												setCookie('notification_cookie_count',theCount);
											}else{
												jQuery("#notification_count").html("99+");
												setCookie('notification_cookie_count',"99+");
											}
										}
										
										var isNew = parsedData["new"];
										//alert("new:"+(isNew == true));
										if(isNew == true){
											jQuery("#notification_count").css("background-color","red");
											setCookie('notification_cookie_color','red');
											deleteCookie('loggedin_click');
										}else{
											var loggedInClicked = getCookie('loggedin_click');
											//alert("loggedInClicked:"+loggedInClicked);
											if(null!=loggedInClicked){
												jQuery("#notification_count").css("background-color","#075DC1");
												setCookie('notification_cookie_color','#075DC1');
											}else{
												jQuery("#notification_count").css("background-color","red");
												setCookie('notification_cookie_color','red');
											}
										
										}
									}
									jQuery("#notification_count").show();
									
									/* alert("count:"+parsedData["count"]);							
									alert("jaCount:"+parsedData["jaCount"]);
									alert("jCount:"+parsedData["jCount"]);
									alert("rvCount:"+parsedData["rvCount"]); */
									
									/**
									start-JA
									*/
									if(jaCount){
										if(jaCount <25){
											jQuery("#base .heading span").html("Job alerts ("+jaCount+")");
										}else{
											jQuery("#base .heading span").html("Job alerts (25+)");
										}
										jQuery("#base .heading a#heading-link").attr("href",context+"inbox-home.html?tab=1&from=notification");
									}else{
										jQuery("#base .heading span").html("Job alerts");
										jQuery("#base .heading a#heading-link").attr("href",context+"inbox-home.html?tab=1&from=notification");
									}
									var size =JSON.parse(parsedData["jaData"]).length;
									
									for(var i=0;i<size;i++){
										var id = JSON.parse(parsedData["jaData"])[i].notificationId;
										var subject = JSON.parse(parsedData["jaData"])[i].subject;
										var since = timeSince(JSON.parse(parsedData["jaData"])[i].creationTime);
										jQuery("#base-li-anchor").html(ellipsize(subject,trimLength));
										jQuery("#base-li-anchor").attr("title",subject);
										jQuery("#base-li-anchor").attr("href",context+"inbox-home.html?tab=1&from=notification&showMessage=yes&ObjectId="+id);
										jQuery("#base-li-time").html(since);
										
										var $clonedLI = jQuery("#base-li").clone();
										//$clonedLI.appendTo(".base_li");
										$clonedLI.appendTo("#base-li-data");
										$clonedLI.attr("id","base_ja_"+i);
										$clonedLI.show();
									}
									jQuery("#base").show();
									//alert("DATA:"+$("#base > ul.base_li").html())
									var $cloned = jQuery("#base").clone();
									$cloned.appendTo(".showdiv");
									$cloned.attr("id","base_ja");
									//alert("jaData[0]:"+ (JSON.parse(parsedData["jaData"]).length));
									jQuery("#base > ul span.base_li").html("");
									
									/**
									end-JA
									*/
									
									/**
									start-J
									*/
								   if(jCount){
									 	if(jCount <25){
											jQuery("#base .heading span").html("Mails from recruiters ("+jCount+")");
										}else{
											jQuery("#base .heading span").html("Mails from recruiters (25+)");
										}
										jQuery("#base .heading a#heading-link").attr("href",context+"inbox-home.html?tab=2&from=notification");
									}else{
										jQuery("#base .heading span").html("Mails from recruiters");
										jQuery("#base .heading a#heading-link").attr("href",context+"inbox-home.html?tab=2&from=notification");
									}
									var size =JSON.parse(parsedData["jData"]).length;
									
									for(var i=0;i<size;i++){
										var id = JSON.parse(parsedData["jData"])[i].notificationId;
										var subject = JSON.parse(parsedData["jData"])[i].EmployerName + " contacted you.";
										var since = timeSince(JSON.parse(parsedData["jData"])[i].creationTime);
										jQuery("#base-li-anchor").html(ellipsize(subject,trimLength));
										jQuery("#base-li-anchor").attr("title",subject);
										jQuery("#base-li-anchor").attr("href",context+"inbox-home.html?tab=2&from=notification&showMessage=yes&ObjectId="+id);
										jQuery("#base-li-time").html(since);
										
										var $clonedLI = jQuery("#base-li").clone();
										//$clonedLI.appendTo(".base_li");
										$clonedLI.appendTo("#base-li-data");
										$clonedLI.attr("id","base_j_"+i);
										$clonedLI.show();
									}
									jQuery("#base").show();
									//alert("DATA:"+$("#base > ul.base_li").html())
									var $cloned = jQuery("#base").clone();
									$cloned.appendTo(".showdiv");
									$cloned.attr("id","base_j");
									//alert("jData[0]:"+timeSince(JSON.parse(parsedData["jData"])[0].creationTime));
									jQuery("#base > ul span.base_li").html(""); 
									
									/**
									end-J
									*/
									
									/**
									start-RV
									*/
									if(rvCount > 0){
										if(rvCount <25){
											jQuery("#base .heading span").html("Who's viewed your profile ("+rvCount+")");
										}else{
											jQuery("#base .heading span").html("Who's viewed your profile (25+)");
										}
										jQuery("#base .heading a#heading-link").attr("href",context+"inbox-home.html?tab=5&from=notification");
									}else{
										jQuery("#base .heading span").html("Who's viewed your profile");
										jQuery("#base .heading a#heading-link").attr("href",context+"inbox-home.html?tab=5&from=notification");
									}
									var size =JSON.parse(parsedData["rvData"]).length;
									
									for(var i=0;i<size;i++){
										var id = JSON.parse(parsedData["rvData"])[i].notificationId;
										var subject = JSON.parse(parsedData["rvData"])[i].subject;
										var employerName = JSON.parse(parsedData["rvData"])[i].EmployerName + " viewed your resume.";
										var since = timeSince(JSON.parse(parsedData["rvData"])[i].creationTime);
										if(null!=employerName && employerName.length > 0){
											jQuery("#base-li-anchor").html(ellipsize(employerName,trimLength));
											jQuery("#base-li-anchor").attr("title",employerName);
										}else{
											jQuery("#base-li-anchor").html("Resume Viewed");
										}
										jQuery("#base-li-anchor").attr("href",context+"inbox-home.html?tab=5&from=notification&showMessage=yes&ObjectId="+id);
										jQuery("#base-li-time").html(since);
										
										var $clonedLI = jQuery("#base-li").clone();
										//$clonedLI.appendTo(".base_li");
										$clonedLI.appendTo("#base-li-data");
										$clonedLI.attr("id","base_rv_"+i);
										$clonedLI.show();
									}
									jQuery("#base").show();
									//alert("DATA:"+$("#base > ul.base_li").html())
									var $cloned = jQuery("#base").clone();
									$cloned.appendTo(".showdiv");
									$cloned.attr("id","base_rv");
									//alert("rvData[0]:"+timeSince(JSON.parse(parsedData["rvData"])[0].employerName));
									jQuery("#base > ul span.base_li").html("");
									/**
									end-RV
									*/
									
									jQuery("#base").hide();
									jQuery("li#base-li").hide();
								},
							complete:function(){
								console.log("complete... inbox-notifications");
								jQuery("#inline_login").hide();
   								jQuery("#non_loggedin").hide();
   								alreadyCalled  = false;
							},
							error: function(x, t, m) {
								console.log("Error message"+m);
								 var randomnumber=Math.floor(Math.random()*100000001);
								 var nlpurl='https://alerts.timesjobs.com/naf/nlpTracking.html?captchaType='+context+"inbox-notifications.html?from="+'&op=respTracking#'+randomnumber;
								 ping(nlpurl);
						        jQuery("#error").show();
							}
						});
			
		}else{
					jQuery("#base_ja").remove();
					jQuery("#base_j").remove();
					jQuery("#base_rv").remove();
					if(0 == race){
						jQuery("#non_loggedin").show();
					}
					
					
					var hideCountCookie = getCookie('hide_nologgedin_count');
					if(null != hideCountCookie){
						/*This is commented because for non logged in user default count 1 is being hidden.*/
						//jQuery("#notification_count").hide();
					}else{
						jQuery("#notification_count").css("background-color","red");
						jQuery("#notification_count").show();
					}
					alreadyCalled  = false;				
		}
	});
}

var updateNotificationCookie = getCookie('update_notification_cookie');
//alert("updateNotificationCookie: "+updateNotificationCookie);
if(null == updateNotificationCookie || updateNotificationCookie==''){
	updateNotificationComponentWithIECheck();
	setCookie('update_notification_cookie',1);
	//alert("cookie set");
	scheduleNotificationCookieToDie();
}else{
	if('true' == authenticated){
		//alert("updating from cookie!!!");
		var notificationCookieCount = getCookie('notification_cookie_count');
		if(null==notificationCookieCount){
			updateNotificationComponent();
		}
		updateNotificationFromCookie();
	}else{
		//alert("not updating from cookie!!!");
		updateNotificationComponentWithIECheck();
	}
}

function scheduleNotificationCookieToDie(){
	setTimeout(function() {
	      deleteCookie('update_notification_cookie');
	      deleteCookie('notification_cookie_count');
	      deleteCookie('notification_cookie_color');
	},5*60*1000);
}

function updateNotificationFromCookie(){
console.log("cookie set for updateNotificationCookie, not making server call.");
		var notificationCookieCount = getCookie('notification_cookie_count');
		//alert("not setting cookie"+updateNotificationCookie);
		if(null!=notificationCookieCount){
			jQuery("#notification_count").html(""+notificationCookieCount);
		}else{
			jQuery("#notification_count").html("1");
		}
		var notificationCookieColor = getCookie('notification_cookie_color');
		//alert("cookie color"+notificationCookieColor);
		if(null!=notificationCookieCount){
			jQuery("#notification_count").css("background-color",notificationCookieColor);
		}else{
			jQuery("#notification_count").css("background-color","red");
		}
		jQuery("#notification_count").show();
}

function updateNotificationComponentWithIECheck(){
<!--[if gte IE 9]> 
		updateNotificationComponent();
	<!--<![endif]-->
	<!--[if lt IE 9]> 
   		jQuery(document).ready(function() {
			updateNotificationComponent();
		});
	<!--<![endif]-->
}

</script>

<div id="autoSuggestList" style="display:none;"><ul></ul></div><iframe frameborder="0" id="FrameautoSuggestList" style="display:none;"></iframe>
<div class="suggestionList srch-suggest" id="autoSuggestList2ndKeywordsListSFB" style="display:none;">
<h5>Suggested Keywords</h5>
<ul></ul></div>
</input></div>

          upload your resume

</input></label>

<script type="text/javascript"> 
  var ssCounterSFB=0;
	function openSecondSuggestionSFB(theSelectedSuggestionText){
		if(ssCounterSFB < 5){
			ajaxController.getSuggestedSkillList(theSelectedSuggestionText,"","SKILL",8,true,cb_openSecondSuggestionSFB);
		}else{
			console.log("CAND-131 Not showing 2nd suggestion.");
		}
	}

	function cb_openSecondSuggestionSFB(result){
		//alert("cb_openSecondSuggestion:"+result);
		var splitData = (""+result).split(",");
		var li_data = "";
		var dataLength = splitData.length;
	    var text = jQuery("#txtKeywords").val();
	    text =text.toLowerCase();
	    if(dataLength >1){
			for(i=0;i<dataLength;i++){
	            if(text.indexOf(splitData[i].toLowerCase()) < 0){
	                var hyperlink =  "javascript:secondSelectionClickedSFB('"+encodeURI(splitData[i])+"');";
					li_data+="<li><a href="+hyperlink+">"+splitData[i]+"</a></li>";
				}
			}
			jQuery("#autoSuggestList2ndKeywordsListSFB ul").html(li_data);
			jQuery("#autoSuggestList2ndKeywordsListSFB").slideDown(300);
			//ssCounterSFB = ssCounterSFB  + 1;
		}		
	}

	function secondSelectionClickedSFB(that){
		//alert("that:"+that);
		_gaq.push(['_trackEvent','Click2Ad','tj_skillsuggestion']);
		jQuery("#autoSuggestList2ndKeywordsListSFB").hide();
		var text = jQuery("#txtKeywords").val();
		var text2 = text.toLowerCase() + ",";
		var that2 = that.toLowerCase();
		var res = text2.split(",");
		var exists = false;
		for(i in res){
			if(null!=res[i] && res[i].length > 0 && res[i]+"".trim() === that2){
				exists = true;
				break;
			} 
		}
		//var index = text2.search(new RegExp(that2, "i"));
		//console.log("exists:"+exists);
		if(!exists){
			jQuery("#txtKeywords").val(text +","+ that);
			jQuery("#txtKeywords").focus();
		}
		openSecondSuggestionSFB(that);
	}
jQuery(document).ready(function(){
	jQuery('#quickSearchBean input[type="text"]').DefaultInputValue();
})

function BasicResFileUpload(){
		//alert('uploaded re loaded');
		new AjaxUpload('resumeFile_basic', {
			action:'/candidate/servlet/FileUploadServlet',
			//responseType: 'json',
			responseType: 'true',
			name: 'resumeFile_basic',
			onSubmit : function() {
				//alert('11');
				document.getElementById("uploadResume_basic").style.display="none";
				document.getElementById("uploadingResume_basic").style.display="block";
			},
			onComplete : function(file,response){
				var displayFilename=file;
				if(file.length >18){
					displayFilename=file.substring(0,18)+"..";
				}
				response = response.replace(/'/g , '"');
				var jsonObj = jQuery.parseJSON(response);
				jsonObj["filename"] = displayFilename;
				ajaxController.setSessionAttribute('tjindexResumeUploadMsg', jsonObj["MESSAGE"]);
				response = JSON.stringify(jsonObj);
				ajaxController.setSessionAttribute('tjindexResumeUpload', response);
				//window.open('/candidate/register.html', '_blank');
				window.location ='/candidate/register.html';
			}	
		});	
	}
	BasicResFileUpload();
  </script>
</div>
<script>
var cntrlIsPressed = false;
$(document).keydown(function(event){
    if(event.ctrlKey)
    	cntrlIsPressed = true;
});
$(document).keyup(function(event){
    cntrlIsPressed = false;
});
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
		jQuery(function(){
			jQuery('.nav-search').click(function(e){
				jQuery('.common-search').slideToggle();
			});
		});
	</script>
<script> 
var name='null';
var phone='null';
var email='null';
//alert("name"+name);
//alert("phone Num"+phone);
if((phone!=null && $.trim(phone).length>0)&& phone.indexOf("+91-")!=-1){
   phone = phone.replace("+91-",'');
}

FRESHCHAT_VISITORINFO={"name":name,"email":email,"phone":phone};
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">

//	alert("Hello");
	    var fc_CSS = document.createElement('link');
	    fc_CSS.setAttribute('rel', 'stylesheet');
	    var fc_isSecured = (window.location && window.location.protocol == 'https:');
	    var fc_lang = document.getElementsByTagName('html')[0].getAttribute('lang');
	    var fc_rtlLanguages = ['ar', 'he'];
	    var fc_rtlSuffix = (fc_rtlLanguages.indexOf(fc_lang) >= 0) ? '-rtl' : '';
	    fc_CSS.setAttribute('type', 'text/css');
	    fc_CSS.setAttribute('href', ((fc_isSecured) ? 'https://d36mpcpuzc4ztk.cloudfront.net' : 'http://assets1.chat.freshdesk.com') + '/css/visitor' + fc_rtlSuffix + '.css');
	    document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(fc_CSS);
	    var fc_JS = document.createElement('script');
	    fc_JS.type = 'text/javascript';
	    fc_JS.defer = true;
	    fc_JS.src = ((fc_isSecured) ? 'https://d36mpcpuzc4ztk.cloudfront.net' : 'http://assets.chat.freshdesk.com') + '/js/visitor.js';
	    (document.body ? document.body : document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0]).appendChild(fc_JS);
	    window.freshchat_setting = ''; 
	
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">

if(document.getElementById("chat-widget") != undefined){
document.getElementById("chat-widget").addEventListener("click", function(event){
    event.preventDefault()
});
}
</script>

<script language="javascript">
 	var pageDesc = "";
	function recJob(){
		if(pageDesc == "true")
			window.location.href="/candidate/job-search.html?kbt=AND&ms=2&searchType=Job_SKILL&luceneResultSize=50&txtKeywords=data  science&from=submit&gadLink=View All data science Jobs";			
		else
			window.location.href="/candidate/job-search.html?kbt=AND&ms=2&searchType=Job_SKILL&luceneResultSize=50&txtKeywords=data  science&from=submit&gadLink=View All data science Jobs";
	}
	function showHideSEO(mainId,act){
		if(act == 'show'){
			document.getElementById(mainId+'_hide').style.display='';
			document.getElementById(mainId+'_more').style.display='none';
		}else if(act == 'hide'){
			document.getElementById(mainId+'_hide').style.display='none';
			document.getElementById(mainId+'_more').style.display='';
		}
	}
</script>

<h2>
<a href="https://www.timesjobs.com/job-detail/data-science-professional-electrobrain-modern-technologies-pvt-ltd-gurgaon-hyderabad-secunderabad-mumbai-noida-greater-noida-pune-5-to-10-yrs-jobid-HPIUpg2oYpRzpSvf__PLUS__uAgZw==" target="_blank"><strong class="blkclor">DATA</strong> <strong class="blkclor">SCIENCE</strong> PROFESSIONAL
									(5 - 10 yrs)</a>
</h2>
<h3 class="joblist-comp-name">
								Electrobrain modern technologies pvt ltd
								
									<span class="comp-more">(<a class="jobs-frm-comp" href="https://www.timesjobs.com/candidate/companySearchResult.html?from=submit&amp;encid=eOt8R__PLUS__C2pyzAYi4CfQotyg==&amp;searchType=byCompany&amp;luceneResultSize=50&amp;gadLink=View all jobs by this recruiter">More Jobs</a>)
									</span>
</h3>
</header>

<li class="clearfix joblistli"><span class="sml-cls cls-icn" title="Hide"></span> <header class="clearfix">
<h2>
<a href="https://www.timesjobs.com/job-detail/data-science-internship-maxgen-technologies-mumbai-dombivali-kalyan-navi-mumbai-thane-0-to-1-yrs-jobid-SWUUjQGC7kxzpSvf__PLUS__uAgZw==" target="_blank"><strong class="blkclor">Data</strong> <strong class="blkclor">Science</strong> Internship

</h2>
<h3 class="joblist-comp-name">
								Maxgen Technologies
								
									<span class="comp-more">(<a class="jobs-frm-comp" href="https://www.timesjobs.com/candidate/companySearchResult.html?from=submit&amp;encid=GXSvsub08IAxd9pert2qGQ==&amp;searchType=byCompany&amp;luceneResultSize=50&amp;gadLink=View all jobs by this recruiter">More Jobs</a>)
									</span>
</h3>
</header>

<script type="text/javascript">
var dataImageLoader="<img src='https://static.timesjobs.com/images_cand/tj_images/personlisation/loader.gif' alt='Loading' class='data-loading'>";
function chkNull(val) {
		flag = false;
		if (val != null && val != 'undefined' && val != '') {
			flag = true;
		}
		return flag;
	}
/*****************Jobs Apply inline Flow start Here********************************/
function jobSRPApplyFuncInline(adid, bookingCenter, featureName) {	
	console.info("jobApplyFuncInline called");	
		if (adid != null && adid != '' && bookingCenter != null	&& bookingCenter != '') {			
			//alert("displayApplyId apply function=="+displayApplyId);			
			var adidBc = bookingCenter + adid;
			var displayApplyId = "showPostApplyData_" + adid;
			if(featureName!=null && featureName=='sjsrp'){
				displayApplyId = "sjPostApplyData_" + adid;
			}
			
			ajaxController.isUserAuthenticated({async:false,callback:function(response) {
				if (response != null && response != false) {					
					jQuery("#"+displayApplyId).html(dataLoader);
					console.info("Job Apply Response1=");
					ajaxController.ajaxPersonalisedJobApply(adidBc,featureName,{async:false,callback: function(data){
						console.info("Job Apply Response2="+data);
					if (data != null && data != '' && data != 'undefined') {
						if(document.getElementById("#JD_"+adid)){
							jQuery("#JD_"+adid).remove();
						}
						if (data.indexOf('ApplyJobs.html') >= 0) {
							var reDirectedUrl = '' + data;
							window.location.replace('/candidate/'+reDirectedUrl);
						} else if (data == 'sucessApplyFlow') {
							jQuery("#" + displayApplyId).load("/candidate/postApplyInlineData.html", {jobId : adid});						
						} else if (data == 'alredyAppliedJob') {
							jQuery("#" + displayApplyId).load("/candidate/postApplyInlineData.html", {jobId : adid,isApplied:true});							
						} else if (data.indexOf(':') >= 0) {				
							jQuery("#" + displayApplyId).load("/candidate/postApplyInlineData.html", {jobId : adid});							
							var temp = data.split(',');
							var openUrl = temp[1];				
							window.open(openUrl, '_blank');
						} else if (data == 'notCompleteResume' || data=='notFullUserWithAppliedJobs') {
								var virtualHostName="www.timesjobs.com";
								var reDirectedUrl;
								var _redirectQueryStr="regApp=n";
								if(data=='notFullUserWithAppliedJobs'){
									_redirectQueryStr="regApp=a&adId="+adid;
								}
								
								if(virtualHostName=='localhost'){
									reDirectedUrl="http://"+virtualHostName+":8080/candidate/register.html?"+_redirectQueryStr;
								}else{
									reDirectedUrl="http://"+virtualHostName+"/candidate/register.html?"+_redirectQueryStr;
								}
								window.location.replace(reDirectedUrl);
						}else {
							jQuery("#" + displayApplyId).html("Vacancy has been filled for this Job");
						}
				} else {
					jQuery("#" + displayApplyId).html("Oops! There seems to be a technical problem. Please try again");
				}
					jQuery("#" + displayApplyId).parents('.job-action').addClass('applied-job');					
					}});
				} else {
					showSRPLoginPopUp("personalizedSRP",adidBc,featureName);
				}
			}});			
		}
	}
	
function applySRPVendorJob(Adid,bc, featureName){
	//alert("adIdBC="+bc+Adid+"featureName="+featureName);
	var isExtTabOpenRole = true;
	
	ajaxController.isUserAuthenticated({async:false,callback:function(response){
		if(response!=null && response==true){
			/* ajaxController.isJobApplyRole({async:false,callback: function(responseStatus){
			if (responseStatus != null) {
			 		isExtTabOpenRole = responseStatus;
			 	}
			
			}});
			console.log('isExtTabOpenRole == '+isExtTabOpenRole); */
			if(isExtTabOpenRole == true){
				ajaxController.openVendorJobUrl(Adid,{async:false, callback: function(response){
					if(response!=null && response!=''){
						var ua = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase();
						if (ua.indexOf('safari') > -1 && ua.indexOf('chrome') == -1) {
							var win = window.open(response, '_blank');
							win.focus();
						} else {
							var a = document.createElement('a');
							a.href = response;
							a.target = '_blank';
							document.body.appendChild(a);
							a.click();
						}
					}					
				}});
			}
			window.location.href = "/candidate/ApplyJobs.html?job="+bc+Adid+"&featureName="+featureName;
		}else{
			var urlNonLogin="/candidate/ajaxLoginJobApply.html?job="+bc+Adid+"&featureName="+featureName;	
			GB_showCenter('You Are Not Logged In', urlNonLogin, 350, 600);				
		}
	}});	
}

	/*****************Jobs Apply inline Flow end Here********************************/
	function showSRPLoginPopUp(callFrom,adidBc,featureName) {
		var queryString="fromPg="+callFrom+"&job="+adidBc+"&featureName="+featureName;		
		var url = '/candidate/ajaxLoginJobApply.html?'+queryString;		
		GB_showCenter('You Are Not Logged In',url,350,600);		
	}
		
	var skipLoginPrompt	=	'';
	function getNextPageResult(pageNo, startDisp){		
		finalQueryCall=jQuery("#searchResultPagincationQuery").text();		
		
		if(finalQueryCall.indexOf('sequence')<0){
			finalQueryCall	=	finalQueryCall+"&sequence="+pageNo;
		}else{
			finalQueryCall	=	finalQueryCall.replace(/sequence=[0-9]*/,'sequence='+pageNo);
		}
		if(finalQueryCall.indexOf('startPage')<0){
			finalQueryCall	=	finalQueryCall+"&startPage="+startDisp;
		}else{
			finalQueryCall	=	finalQueryCall.replace(/startPage=[0-9]*/,'startPage='+startDisp);
		}
		finalQueryCall	=	'https://www.timesjobs.com/candidate/?from=submit&'+finalQueryCall;		
		window.location.href	=	finalQueryCall;
	}
	
	function trackClickEvent(category,action){
		_gaq.push(['_trackEvent',category,action]);
	}	

	function getSRPResultByDwr(urlToHit) {
		jQuery( "#refine-opt-search-datewise a" ).removeClass( "refinejobsopt" );
		jQuery("#defualtSelectedDate").addClass( "refinejobsopt" );		
		jQuery("#searchResultData").remove();
		jQuery("#searchResultContents").html(dataImageLoader);		
		var matchStr=urlToHit.match("&undo=(.*)&undoValue");//For Selecting tab on Cluster
		
		ajaxController.getDWRBasedWebResponse(urlToHit,function(data) {
							if (data != null && data != 'undefined') {
								jQuery("#searchResultContents").html(data);
								
								console.info("matchStr=="+matchStr);
								if(chkNull(matchStr)){
									console.info("matched text at posotion 1="+matchStr[1]);
									showSelectedTabData(matchStr[1]);			
								}
								if(matchStr==null && urlToHit.indexOf("undo=")!=-1){
									jQuery( ".refined-bx" ).tabs("refresh");
									
								}
								//For making initial tab selected
								if(urlToHit.indexOf("&reset")!=-1){
									console.info("inside reset all tab");
									jQuery( ".refined-bx" ).tabs("refresh");
								}
							} else {
								jQuery("#searchResultContents").html("Oops! There seems to be a technical problem. Please try again");
							}
						});
						return false;
	}
/*************Sorting of jobs start here******************************/
/*****************Jobs Shorting/Clipping Flow Start Here********************************/
jQuery(document).on('click', 'a.srtlst-link', function () {	
	var clickedHrefVal=jQuery(this).attr("id");
	console.info("shortlisted adid="+clickedHrefVal);
	//var spanData="<span id='"+clickedHrefVal+"' class='srtlsted-link'>Shortlisted</span>";			
	if(chkNull(clickedHrefVal)){
	var adidBc=clickedHrefVal.split('_');	
	
	ajaxController.isUserAuthenticated(function(response){
			if(response!=null && response !=false){			
				ajaxController.savedShortListed(adidBc[1],adidBc[2],function(data){				
				if(data!=null && data!=undefined && data!=''){
					jQuery(".srtlst-link."+clickedHrefVal).addClass("srtlsted-link");
					/* jQuery("#"+clickedHrefVal).after(spanData);	  */	
					//jQuery("#"+clickedHrefVal).remove();									
				}else{					
					jQuery("#"+clickedHrefVal).after("<span>Please try Later</span>");	 	
					jQuery("#"+clickedHrefVal).remove();
				}				
				});				
			}else{
				showLoginPopUp('searchResultPage');
			}
		});		
	}    
    return false;
});
function showLoginPopUp(callFrom) {
		var queryString="fromPg="+callFrom;		
		var url = '/candidate/ajaxLoginJobApply.html?'+queryString;		
		GB_showCenter('You Are Not Logged In',url,350,600);		
	}	
/*****************Jobs Shorting/Clipping Flow end Here********************************/
/****************Cluster related changes start here***********************************/
function getClusterData(urlToHit) {
		jQuery("#clusterDataInitial").empty();		
		jQuery("#clusterDataInitial").html(dataImageLoader);
		//jQuery("#tj-tab-container-clusterId").html(dataImageLoader);
		ajaxController.getDWRBasedWebResponse(urlToHit,function(data) {
							if (data != null && data != 'undefined') {
								jQuery("#clusterDataInitial").html(data);								
								
								/* var historyData=jQuery("#refineHistoryData").html();
								alert("historyData=="+historyData);
								jQuery("#refineHistoryData").empty();
								alert("historyData=="+historyData);
								jQuery("#clusterRefineHistoryId").html(historyData);		
								 urlToHit=urlToHit+"&undoRefine=remove";						
								getAjaxBasedWebResponse(urlToHit, "clusterRefineHistoryId"); */
								/***************Start Ui Related hadling*************/
								//jQuery('.tab-filter-container *:first-child').addClass('active');

								//var visclassch = jQuery('.refine-tab .tab-filter li.active').attr("class");
								//visclassch=visclassch.replace(/active/,'');
								//alert(visclassch);
								//jQuery('.tab-filter-container  *[class~='+visclassch+']').addClass('active').siblings().removeClass('active');
								if($.fn.slimscroll){
									jQuery('.cluster-scroll').slimscroll({height: '106px', railVisible: true});	
								}
								
								
								jQuery('input:radio').parent('label').addClass('rdo');
								jQuery('input:radio:checked').parent('label').addClass('radio-chkd');
								jQuery('input:radio').change(function(){
									var radioname = jQuery(this).attr('name');									
									if(jQuery(this).is(':checked') || jQuery('input:radio[name="'+radioname+'"]').is(':checked')) {
										jQuery(this).parent('label').siblings().removeClass('radio-chkd');
										jQuery('input:radio[name="'+radioname+'"]').parent('label').removeClass('radio-chkd');
										jQuery(this).parent('label').addClass('radio-chkd');
									} else {
										jQuery(this).parent('label').removeClass('radio-chkd');
									}
								});
								/***************End Ui Related hadling*************/
							} else {
								jQuery("#clusterDataInitial").html("Oops! There seems to be a technical problem. Please try again");
							}
						});
						return false;
	}
/****************Cluster related changes end here***********************************/
/****************Remove Cluster ajaxification start here****************************/
function getAjaxBasedWebResponse(urlToHit,displayContentDivId){
	jQuery("#"+displayContentDivId).empty();
	jQuery("#"+displayContentDivId).html(dataImageLoader);
	ajaxController.getDWRBasedWebResponse(urlToHit,function(data) {
							if (data != null && data != 'undefined') {
								jQuery("#"+displayContentDivId).html(data);
								//jQuery('.tj-tab-container > *:first-child').addClass('active');
							} else {
								jQuery("#"+displayContentDivId).html("Oops! There seems to be a technical problem. Please try again");
							}
						});
						return false;

}
/****************Remove Cluster ajaxification end here****************************/
 function removeSpecificRefine(urltoHit){
 	getSRPResultByDwr(urltoHit); 	
 	return false;
 } 
function refineDateWise(postweek,refineBy){	
	var queryList=jQuery("#searchResultQueryList").text();
	if(chkNull(queryList)){		
		if(queryList.indexOf('postWeek')>-1){		
			queryList=queryList.replace(/postWeek=[0-9]*/,'postWeek='+postweek);		
			searchUrl="/"+''+"?refineBy=dateWise&refineOpt=true&"+queryList;	
		}else{			
			searchUrl="/"+''+"?refineBy=dateWise&refineOpt=true&postWeek="+postweek+"&"+queryList;
		}
		if(chkNull(refineBy)){
			searchUrl=searchUrl+"&searchName=expiry";
		}else{			
			searchUrl=searchUrl.replace("&searchName=expiry","");
		}
		console.info("refineDateWise="+searchUrl);
		jQuery("#searchResultData").remove();
		jQuery("#searchResultContents").html(dataImageLoader);
		ajaxController.getDWRBasedWebResponse(searchUrl,function(data) {		
							if (data != null && data != 'undefined') {
								jQuery("#searchResultContents").html(data);
							} else {
								jQuery("#searchResultContents").html("Oops! There seems to be a technical problem. Please try again");
							}
						});
	}	

}

function logUSBT(action,rank){
	var page = jQuery('em.active').text();
	ajaxController.logUSBT(action,rank,page);
}

function callExtJobApply(adid,urllink,featureName){
	
	var isExtTabOpenRole = true;
	var isAuthenticated = false;
	var isActiveResume = true;
	
	
	var callnewtab=false;
	urllink=urllink+"&fnm="+featureName;
	ajaxController.isUserAuthenticated({async:false,callback: function(response){
		if (response != null && response == true) {
				ajaxController.isJobApplyRole({async:false,callback: function(responseStatus){
				if (responseStatus != null) {
				 		isExtTabOpenRole = responseStatus;
				 	}
				
				}});
				console.log('isExtTabOpenRole == '+isExtTabOpenRole);
			
				isAuthenticated = true;
				if(isExtTabOpenRole == true)
		 		 callnewtab=true;
		 	}
		else{
			var url='/candidate/extJobApply.html?'+urllink;
		 	var urlNonLogin="/candidate/ajaxLoginJobApply.html?fromPg=extJob&extJobApplyUrl="+url;	
			GB_showCenter('You Are Not Logged In', urlNonLogin, 350, 600);
		}
	}});
	ajaxController.getInActiveUserResumes({async:false, callback:function(response){
		if(response!=null && response !=''){
			window.parent.parent.location="/candidate/myhome.html";
			callnewtab = false;
			isActiveResume = false;
		}
	}});
	if (callnewtab == true) {
		ajaxController.externalCompanyUrl(adid, {async : false,	callback : function(response) {
			if (response != null && response != '') {
				var ua = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase();
				if (ua.indexOf('safari') > -1
						&& ua.indexOf('chrome') == -1) {
					var win = window.open(response, '_blank');
					win.focus();
				} else {
					var a = document.createElement('a');
					a.href = response;
					a.target = '_blank';
					document.body.appendChild(a);
					a.click();
				}
			}
		}
	});
	}
	
	if(isAuthenticated == true && isActiveResume == true){
		var url = '/candidate/extJobApply.html?' + urllink;
		window.location.href = url;
	}
}


	function bannerCountTrack(banner){	
	//http://10.150.200.54/naf/nlpTracking.html?captchaType=tjbanner&op=respTracking
	var randomnumber=Math.floor(Math.random()*100000001);
	var url='https://alerts.timesjobs.com/naf/nlpTracking.html?captchaType='+ banner + '#' + randomnumber;
	ping(url);
	};
	function ping(url) {		
		var ImageObject = new Image();
		ImageObject.src = url; //e.g. logo
	}
	
function refApply(jbUrl,loginId,jobId,encJobId){
	ajaxController.referralAvailForJob(loginId,jobId,"ajaxCall",{async:false, callback: function(response){
		if(response!=null && response!=''){
			if(response === 'referral'){
				var win = window.open(jbUrl+encJobId, '_blank');
				win.focus();
			}
			if(response === 'refLimitOut'){
				refLimitOut();
			}
			if(response === 'refApplied'){
				jQuery('.refApplied').show();
			}
		}
	}});
}
function refLimitOut(){
	//document.getElementById('refLimitOut').style.display='';
	jQuery('.refLimitOut').show();
};
function referralButtonCountTrack(referral,loginId,adId){
	var randomnumber=Math.floor(Math.random()*100000001);
	var url='https://alerts.timesjobs.com/naf/nlpTracking.html?captchaType='+referral+'&op=respTracking#'+randomnumber;
	console.log("jb referral nlp tracking url = "+url);
	ping(url);
	if(loginId != null && loginId != ""){
		url='https://alerts.timesjobs.com/naf/node/dataLogger/dataLogging.html?cl=referral_clicked_loginId&lid=' + loginId + '&adId=' + adId + '&ts=' + '2023-01-28 23:19:49.469';
		console.log("jb referral user dataLogger url = "+url);
		ping(url);
	}
	
} 
function ping(url){
	var ImageObject = new Image();
	ImageObject.src = url;
}
function applyAndRefApplyClickEvent(category,action){
	trackClickEvent(category,action);
	
}
jQuery(document).ready(function(){
	
});
</script>
<script>
jQuery(function() {
jQuery(".job-action *").tooltip({
      show: null,
      position: {
        my: "left top",
        at: "left bottom"
      },
      open: function( event, ui ) {
        ui.tooltip.animate({ top: ui.tooltip.position().top + 10 }, "fast" );
      }
    });
});
/* var userLoginId = 'false';
if(userLoginId == 'false'){
	var cookieValue=getCookie('jobAlert');
	window.setTimeout(onloadJobAlert, 10000 );			    
	function onloadJobAlert(){
		if (cookieValue == null && GB_CURRENT == null) {
			trackClickEvent('jobAlertSEO','jobAlertSEOPopupOpen');
			GB_showCenter('Create a Job Alert','/candidate/jobAlert.html?txtKeywords=data  science&cboWorkExp1=&txtLocation=',400, 340, callbackfun);
		}
	}

	function callbackfun(){
		var d = new Date();
		d.setTime(d.getTime()+(30*60*1000));
		setCookie('jobAlert',20,d);
		trackClickEvent('jobAlertSRP','jobAlertSRPClose');
	}
} */
</script>

<div class="top-ind-tab clearfix">
<ul class="tj-tab tab clearfix">

<a href="https://www.timesjobs.com/jobskill/project-management-jobs" target="_blank">Project Management
														Jobs</a>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>
</section>
<!-- lhs ends here -->

<script type="text/javascript">
	jQuery(function(){
		jQuery('.recmJobs').delay(10000).animate({right:'0px'}, 'slow').queue(function(){jQuery(this).find('.alert_recmJobsIMG').addClass('alert_recmJobsIMGLess'); jQuery(this).dequeue();}).delay(50000).animate({right:'-264px'}, 'slow').queue(function(){jQuery(this).find('.alert_recmJobsIMG').removeClass('alert_recmJobsIMGLess'); jQuery(this).dequeue();});
			var boolVal = true;
			jQuery('.alert_recmJobsIMG').click(function(){
			jQuery('.recmJobs').clearQueue();
			jQuery('.recmJobs').stop();
			if(jQuery('.recmJobs').css('right') > '-264px'){
				boolVal=false;
			}else{
				boolVal=true;
			}
			if (boolVal){
				jQuery('.recmJobs').animate({right:'0px'}, 'slow').queue(function(){jQuery(this).find('.alert_recmJobsIMG').addClass('alert_recmJobsIMGLess'); jQuery(this).dequeue();});
				boolVal=false;
			}else{
				jQuery('.recmJobs').animate({right:'-264px'}, 'slow').queue(function(){jQuery(this).find('.alert_recmJobsIMG').removeClass('alert_recmJobsIMGLess'); jQuery(this).dequeue();});
				boolVal=true;
			}
		});
	});
</script>
<!-- lhs ends here -->
<!-- rhs starts here -->
<aside class="rhs">
<!-- location Generic job start-->
<div class="widget-rhs related-searches">
<header class="blue-header">
<h2 class="header-cntr">Related Searches By: Skills</h2>
</header>
<div class="white-bx">
<div id="skillJobsSearchDiv"></div>
<script id="skillJobsSearchTemplate" type="text/template">
	<ul class="skill-job-srch">
		{{#linkSkillArr}}
			<li><a onclick="srpCallSkill('{{.}}');"><i class="material-icons">keyboard_backspace</i> {{.}}</a></li>
		{{/linkSkillArr}}
	</ul>
	{{#showMore}}
		<div class="show-more-jobs"><a class="button blue-btn active">View More (<span class="job-counts active"></span>)</a></div>
	{{/showMore}}
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
 	var skillKeys = 'data science';
 	var searchedTxtWords = skillKeys;
 	var skillKeysArr = skillKeys.split(',');
 	skillKeys = encodeURIComponent(skillKeysArr[skillKeysArr.length - 1]);
 	function getSkillGapData(){
		var context="";
	 	if(-1 == window.location.href.indexOf("/candidate/")) {
	 		context="/candidate/";
	 		//alert("bingo");
	 	}
	 	var dataLoader="<img src='https://static.timesjobs.com/images_cand/tj_images/personlisation/loader.gif' alt='Loading' class='data-loading'>";
		jQuery.ajax({
			cache:false,
			url:context + "skillGapWidget.html?skills=" + skillKeys.toLowerCase(),
			dataType:'json',
			async : false,
			beforeSend:function(){
				jQuery('#skillJobsSearchDiv').html(dataLoader);
				console.log("beforeSend... get related skills based on skill");
			},
			success:function(jsonResp){
				//alert(JSON.stringify(jsonResp));
				var skillArr = jsonResp["skillValues"];
				var linkSkillArr = [];
				if(skillArr && skillArr.length > 0){
					for ( var i = 0; i < skillArr.length && i<5; i++ ) {
						if(searchedTxtWords.toLowerCase().indexOf(skillArr[i].toLowerCase()) == -1){
							linkSkillArr.push(skillArr[i]);
						}
					}
					jsonResp["linkSkillArr"] = linkSkillArr;
					if(linkSkillArr.length > 0){
						if(jQuery('#related-search-block').length>0){
							jQuery('#related-search-block').show();
						}
						if(linkSkillArr.length > 5){
							jsonResp["showMore"] = true;
						}else{
							jsonResp["showMore"] = false;
						}
						var template = jQuery('#skillJobsSearchTemplate').html();
			   	 		var html = Mustache.to_html(template, jsonResp);
			   	 		jQuery('#skillJobsSearchDiv').html(html);
			   	 	
			   	 		//jQuery('.skill-job-srch').showmorejob({'listinghide':5,'listingshow':5,});
		   	 		}else{
		   	 			jQuery('#skillJobsSearchDiv').hide();
		   	 		}
				}else{
					//jQuery('#skillJobsSearchDiv').html('Search more jobs to get related searches');
					jQuery('#skillJobsSearchDiv').hide();					
					if(jQuery('#related-search-block').length>0){
						jQuery('#related-search-block').hide();
						jQuery('#skill-search-widget-tab').hide();
					}else if(jQuery('#related-search-block-skills').length>0){
	                    jQuery('#related-search-block-skills').hide();
	                }
				}
			},
			complete:function(){
				console.log("complete... get related skills based on skill");
			}
		});
	}
	function srpCallSkill(key){
		var url = 'https://www.timesjobs.com/candidate/job-search.html?searchType=personalizedSearch&from=submit&txtKeywords=' + encodeURIComponent(searchedTxtWords + ',' + key);
		window.open(url, '_self');
	}
	getSkillGapData();
 </script>
</div>
</div>
<div class="widget-rhs related-searches">
<header class="blue-header">
<h2 class="header-cntr">Related Searches By: Designation</h2>
</header>
<div class="white-bx">
<div id="designationJobsSearchDiv"></div>
<script id="designationJobsSearchTemplate" type="text/template">
    <ul class="desig-job-srch">
        {{#linkDesignationArr}}
            <li><a onclick="srpCallDesignation('{{.}}');"><i class="material-icons">keyboard_backspace</i> {{.}}</a></li>
        {{/linkDesignationArr}}
    </ul>
    {{#showMore}}
        <div class="show-more-jobs"><a class="button blue-btn active">View More (<span class="job-counts active"></span>)</a></div>
    {{/showMore}}
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
    var desigShowFlag = true;
    var skillKeys = 'data science';
    var searchedTxtWords = skillKeys;
    var skillKeysArr = skillKeys.split(',');
    skillKeys = skillKeysArr[skillKeysArr.length - 1];
    function getRetaledDesignation(){
        console.info("related designation");
        var dataLoader="<img src='https://static.timesjobs.com/images_cand/tj_images/personlisation/loader.gif' alt='Loading' class='data-loading'>";
        jQuery('#designationJobsSearchDiv').html(dataLoader);
        console.log("beforeSend... get related designation based on skill");
        skillKeys = encodeURIComponent(skillKeys);
        skillKeys = skillKeys.toLowerCase();
        var url = 'http://visualsearch.timesjobs.com/VisualSearch/VisualSearch/select?q=(refKey:("' + skillKeys + '"))&start=0&rows=28&indent=on&wt=json&fq=type:RR&fl=refKey,refMap';
        ajaxController.getHttpCon(url, {async:false, callback: function(response){
            if(response!=null && response !=''){
                //alert(JSON.stringify(response));
                console.log("getRetaledDesignation widget called....");
                var jsonResp = jQuery.parseJSON(response);
                var object = jsonResp["response"];
                if(object["numFound"] > 0){
                    object = object["docs"];
                    object = object[0];
                    var designationValues = object["refMap"];
                    jsonResp["designationValues"] = designationValues;
                    var linkDesignationArr = [];
                    if(designationValues.length > 0){
                        for ( var i = 0; i < designationValues.length && i<5; i++ ) {
                            if(searchedTxtWords.toLowerCase().indexOf(designationValues[i].toLowerCase()) == -1){
                                linkDesignationArr.push(designationValues[i]);
                            }
                        }
                        jsonResp["linkDesignationArr"] = linkDesignationArr;
                        if(linkDesignationArr.length > 0){
                            if(jQuery('#related-search-block').length>0){
                                jQuery('#related-search-block').show();
                            }
                            if(linkDesignationArr.length > 5){
                                jsonResp["showMore"] = true;
                            }else{
                                jsonResp["showMore"] = false;
                            }
                            desigShowFlag = false;
                            var template = jQuery('#designationJobsSearchTemplate').html();
                            var html = Mustache.to_html(template, jsonResp);
                            jQuery('#designationJobsSearchDiv').html(html);
                            //jQuery('.desig-job-srch').showmorejob({'listinghide':5,'listingshow':5,});
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            if(desigShowFlag){
                if(jQuery('#related-search-block').length>0){
                    jQuery('#related-search-block').hide();
                    jQuery('#designation-search-widget-tab').hide();
                }else if(jQuery('#related-search-block-designation').length>0){
                	jQuery('#related-search-block-designation').hide();
                }
                jQuery('#designationJobsSearchDiv').hide();
                
                //jQuery('#designationJobsSearchDiv').html('Search more jobs to get related searches');
            }
        }});
    }
    function srpCallDesignation(key){
        var url = 'https://www.timesjobs.com/candidate/job-search.html?searchType=personalizedSearch&from=submit&txtKeywords=' + encodeURIComponent(searchedTxtWords + ',' + key);
        window.open(url, '_self');
    }
    getRetaledDesignation();
 </script>
</div>
</div>

 googletag.pubads().collapseEmptyDivs();
 googletag.enableServices();
 });

<script>
 $(document).ready(function() {
      $(".gdpr-btn").click(function(){
          jQuery.ajax({
              async:false,
              url:'/candidate/gdpr-compliance.html',
              cache:false,
              data:{                
            	  act:'OK',             
            	  src:'TJWEB'
              },
              beforeSend:function(){
            	  console.info("GDPR compliance ok");
              },
              success:function(htmlResponse){
            	  jQuery(".gdpr-info").remove();            	  
              }
          });
      }); 
  });
  </script>

<script>
	var parameter="";
	var regFlow="";
	var loginFlow="";
	var applyFlow="";
		
	regFlow="false";
	loginFlow="false";
	applyFlow="false";
	
	if(regFlow=="true")
	{
		parameter="_registrationFlow";
		ajaxController.trackCounter(parameter, "reg_3p9901_exp");	
	}
	else if(loginFlow=="true"){
		var login = new RegExp("login.html", "i");
		if(!login.test(window.top.location) ){
			parameter="_loginFlow";
			ajaxController.trackCounter(parameter, "login_3p9901_exp");
		}
	}
	
	if(applyFlow=="true"){
		parameter="_applyFlow";
		ajaxController.trackCounter(parameter, "apply_3p9901_exp");
	}
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function freshWidgetCallback(){
		FreshWidget.init("", {"queryString": "&widgetType=popup&captcha=yes&searchArea=no", "backgroundImage": "https://www.ceoconnect.in/feedback/images/tj_feedback.gif", "utf8": "?", "widgetType": "popup", "buttonType": "image", "buttonText": "Support", "buttonColor": "black", "buttonBg": "#b8eaff", "alignment": "2", "offset": "145px", "formHeight": "500px", "captcha": "yes", "url": "https://timesjobs.freshdesk.com"} );
	}
    (function () {
         var s = document.createElement('script');
         s.type = 'text/javascript';
         s.async = true;
         s.src = 'https://assets.freshdesk.com/widget/freshwidget.js';
         var x = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
         // most browsers
		s.onload = freshWidgetCallback;
		// IE 6 & 7
		s.onreadystatechange = function() {
			if (this.readyState == 'complete') {
				freshWidgetCallback();
			}
		}
         x.parentNode.insertBefore(s, x);
    })();    
</script>
